title: ariyadavarige
sahitya:
ariyadavarige vicitra harige lIlA mAtra aridavaru namma guru paramAtma sUtra


caraNam 1    kariya kUrmana mEle urugAlakiccelli irava tumbisi jalavu iruvadelli 
sura narara priyavAda pAyasada ruciyelli bariya mAtalla ballare pELiraNNa
    caraNam 2    aSTajnAdi taila akrtata bageyEnu aSTa daLada maNTapake kambhaveSTu 
kaSTavAda kAmana pinda kukkuTana tuTTa tuDi moTTa modalane pELiraNNa
    caraNam 3    vAsuki heDeyalidda vrkSada koneya vAsavAgiha pakSi pesaruyEnu dEshAdhipati 
namma purandara viTTala tanna dAsara hrdayadoLagiDagi summanihudEnu
